1.name: Bulbasaur
1.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

2.name: Ivysaur
2.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

3.name: Venusaur
3.description: The flower on its back catches the sun’s rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy

4.name: Charmander
4.description: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

5.name: Charmeleon
5.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

6.name: Charizard
6.description: Its wings can carry this POKéMON close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

7.name: Squirtle
7.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

8.name: Wartortle
8.description: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

9.name: Blastoise
9.description: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

10.name: Caterpie
10.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

11.name: Metapod
11.description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

12.name: Butterfree
12.description: Its wings, covered with poisonous powder, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

13.name: Weedle
13.description: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.

14.name: Kakuna
14.description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

15.name: Beedrill
15.description: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

16.name: Pidgey
16.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

17.name: Pidgeotto
17.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

18.name: Pidgeot
18.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
